title: Deg (1997) Genesis Portion
description: Deg (also known as Aculo, Buru, Degha, Janela, Mmfo, or Mo) is a Gur (Gurunsi) language of Ghana, with also 1,100 speakers in Ivory Coast.Vagla is a related language.

language.name: Deg
language.area: West central, west of Volta Lake. Also in Côte d’Ivoire.
